name: google-maps-documentation
description: In sync, versioned copy of Google Maps API documentation

scripts.start: yarn clean && yarn crawl && yarn push_master
scripts.push_master: git checkout master && rm -rf docs/*.md && cp html/*.md docs/ && yarn add_script_to_docs && yarn commit_master && git checkout develop
scripts.add_script_to_docs: for f in ./html/*.md; do echo '<script src="replace_links.js"></script>' >> "$f" ; done
scripts.commit_master: git checkout develop docs/index.md && git checkout develop docs/README.md && yarn commit_message && git push -f
scripts.commit_message: git add --all && git commit -am "docs for `git log --format=%B -n 1 develop | head -1`" || true

author: amenadiel@gmail.com
